content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 24-31)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Functional Power Plant at (-9.5, 0.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 0.5) facing right
- Boiler at (-7.0, 1.5) facing right (currently out of fuel)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 1.5) facing right (not connected to power network)
- Connected with water pipes between pump and boiler
- Connected with steam pipes between boiler and engine
- Small electric pole at (-2.5, 3.5) (power network issues)

### Smelting and Production Area
- Iron smelting furnace at (5.0, 0.0) (contains 14 iron ore, 50 coal)
- Copper smelting furnace at (5.0, 4.0) (contains 14 copper ore, 36 coal)
- Gear assembler at (8.5, 0.5) (no power, missing iron plates)
- Cable assembler at (8.5, 4.5) (no power, missing copper plates)
- Science assembler at (12.5, 2.5) (no power, missing inputs)
- Power poles present but network not functioning properly

### Transport Infrastructure
- Iron plate inserter at (6.5, 0.5) facing right (no power)
- Copper plate inserter at (6.5, 4.5) facing right (no power)
- Gear output inserter at (10.5, 0.5) facing left (no power)
- Multiple failed attempts to place transport belts at (7.5, 0.5) and (7.5, 4.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Power system failures
- Boiler is out of fuel - regularly check and refuel power generation components
- Steam engine not connected to power network - verify all power pole connections
- Multiple machines showing "no power" status - fix power generation first before addressing other issues

### Entity placement errors
- Repeated attempts to place belts at occupied positions (7.5, 0.5) and (7.5, 4.5)
  - Always check for existing entities before placement
  - Remove blocking entities first if replacement is needed
- Attempted placement from too far away (distance 87.8 when max is 10)
  - Move character close to build location before placing entities

### Production chain issues
- Multiple machines showing ingredient shortages:
  - Verify raw material supply (mining → furnaces → assemblers)
  - Check transport connections between each production step
- Furnaces have fuel but some assemblers lack power - prioritize fixing power network

### Inventory management
- Attempted to insert iron ore without having any - always verify inventory before insertion
- Collected resources (iron/copper ore) but didn't deliver to furnaces - complete the transport chain

### General troubleshooting
- Address power issues first as they affect all other operations
- Fix one production line completely before moving to others
- Check entity status messages systematically from raw materials to final product
